name: petapp
description: PetApp is an application where people can find adorable pets like Cats dogs or Birds, and can send a request to the owner to adopt them. So as User i can : - Post an animal so other can see it and adopt it if they want.(POST) - Scroll around all disponible animals.(LIST) - Send a request to the owner. - Chat with the owner. - Post comments.(POST) - Have more information about the owner/seeker.(SHOW) - See animal details.(SHOW) And ofcourse there must be : - A register form. - A login form. - Profile Edit.
author: mehdi bourahla
